trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Chebanse
There were no other sightings in Chebanse on or around August 1st 2009
divs: sighting detailsthe ufo tonight seems triangular bright light in middle possibly red\orange. lighter lights on edges hovering. also hovering in circles. seen at my familys house on 3200 e rd in chebanse\clifton. in sky towards the south hovering high, stopped many times before. once up close and confirmed that one was triangular. started seeing it last fall of 08 or before. honestly we look for it. but none of them wanted to report it. so i am! dont know who else to call about it. sometimes seen around 8:30 pm.
